articles.content: James Corden joined the ranks of late-night TV hosts who have recently tested positive for the coronavirus, disclosing his diagnosis on Thursday as tapings of his CBS program, The Late Late Show, wer… [+838 chars]

articles.title: The Tragedy Of Macbeth Trailer: Denzel Washington And Frances McDormand Scheme Their Way Through A Shakespeare Classic - /Film
articles.description: Watch the absolutely stunning full trailer for Joel Coen's The Tragedy of Macbeth starring the incredible Denzel Washington.
articles.content: "I think a very important thing about Joel's adaptation is that we are not calling it Macbeth," McDormand said in a previous interview. "We're calling it 'The Tragedy of Macbeth,' which I think is an… [+1603 chars]

articles.author: David Grossman
articles.title: Ozark season 4 trailer: Netflix’s crime saga returns for a final showdown - Polygon
articles.description: Jason Bateman and Laura Linney return as Marty and Wendy in Netflix’s crime saga on January 21. The final season starts with Part 1, and a trailer teases big twists for Julia Garner’s Ruth and Skylar Gaertner’s Jonah.
articles.content: Wendy and Marty are saying goodbye

articles.author: Frank Pallotta, CNN Business
articles.title: Hoda Kotb, host of NBC's 'Today,' tests positive for Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: After hosts of NBC's late night shows were hit with Covid, the network's morning show had a host of its own catch the virus.
